generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are planted along the sidewalks and road, with some greenery visible near the curb.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking in the distance on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road, including a black SUV on the right and a black sedan on the left.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "Caritas - Haus" with an arrow is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
